document.full_text: america's global dominance of the private equity industry will likely remain for only a handful more years, as other geographies grow stronger and rival firms around the world flex their muscles, carlyle group  co-founder david rubenstein predicted on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. buyout dominance likely to recede: carlyle
lines_and_colors: america's global dominance of the private equity industry will likely remain for only a handful more years, as other geographies grow stronger and rival firms around the world flex their muscles, carlyle group  co-founder david rubenstein predicted on tuesday.
